summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to and providing for disposition of certain monies seized and forfeited, and proceeds of the sale of goods and materials seized and forfeited, pursuant to the Money Laundering Act, RCW 9A.83; accepting such forfeitures; appropriating such monies to reimburse expenses incurred by the Police Department to expand Police Department programs that enforce controlled substances-related laws in accordance with RCW 9A.83, and to transfer to the State its required share of the value of such forfeitures; and increasing the 2003 Budget of the Police Department; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
